reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Minister of State for Rural Economic Development Expected Results for the 2017/2018 Fiscal Year Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation applies to the Minister of State for Rural Economic Development for the 2017/2018 fiscal year.
In this regulation, Act means the Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Minister of State for Rural Economic Development
bcl:section.bcl:text: The expected results that the Minister of State for Rural Economic Development is to achieve for the purposes of section 5 (3) of the Act are as follows:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: consult with the Rural Advisory Council during the implementation of the rural economic development strategy and report on its progress by December 31, 2017;
measure and report on performance metrics that measure project outcomes and benefits to rural BC for the Rural Dividend Program by March 31, 2018;
finalize funding announcements for the second year of the Rural Dividend Program by March 31, 2018;
submit to Cabinet a report on the results referred to in paragraphs (a) through (c) on or before March 31, 2018.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Balanced Budget and Ministerial Accountability Act, S.B.C. 2001, c. 28, section 9]
